weapons.name: Club
weapons.description: A one-handed bludgeon that can be thrown 10 feet.

weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.description: A versatile short blade. Agile, finesse, throwable, and can deal slashing damage.

weapons.name: Gauntlet
weapons.description: A metal glove for punching. Agile with a free hand for grappling.

weapons.name: Light Mace
weapons.description: A small mace. Agile and finesse with the ability to shove targets.

weapons.name: Longspear
weapons.description: A two-handed spear with 10-foot reach.

weapons.name: Mace
weapons.description: A one-handed bludgeon that can shove targets.

weapons.name: Morningstar
weapons.description: A spiked club that can deal piercing damage instead.

weapons.name: Sickle
weapons.description: A curved blade. Agile, finesse, and can trip opponents.

weapons.name: Spear
weapons.description: A one-handed spear throwable up to 20 feet.

weapons.name: Staff
weapons.description: A wooden staff. Deals 1d8 when wielded two-handed.

weapons.name: Blowgun
weapons.description: A tube for shooting darts. Agile, nonlethal by default.

weapons.name: Crossbow
weapons.description: A two-handed crossbow with 120-foot range increments.

weapons.name: Dart
weapons.description: A small thrown projectile. Agile with 20-foot range.

weapons.name: Hand Crossbow
weapons.description: A one-handed crossbow with 60-foot range increments.

weapons.name: Heavy Crossbow
weapons.description: A powerful two-handed crossbow with 120-foot range and high damage.

weapons.name: Javelin
weapons.description: A throwing spear with 30-foot range.

weapons.name: Sling
weapons.description: A simple ranged weapon adding half Strength to damage.

weapons.name: Bastard Sword
weapons.description: A versatile sword dealing 1d12 when wielded two-handed.

weapons.name: Battle Axe
weapons.description: A one-handed axe with sweep for hitting multiple targets.

weapons.name: Bo Staff
weapons.description: A monk weapon with reach, parry, and trip capabilities.

weapons.name: Falchion
weapons.description: A heavy curved sword with forceful and sweep for cleaving through groups.

weapons.name: Flail
weapons.description: A chain weapon that can disarm, sweep, and trip opponents.

weapons.name: Glaive
weapons.description: A polearm with reach. Deadly d8 adds damage on critical hits; forceful boosts successive strikes.

weapons.name: Greataxe
weapons.description: A massive two-handed axe with sweep for hitting adjacent foes.

weapons.name: Greatclub
weapons.description: A heavy two-handed club. Backswing aids follow-up attacks; can shove targets.

weapons.name: Greatsword
weapons.description: A large two-handed sword that can deal piercing or slashing damage.

weapons.name: Guisarme
weapons.description: A hooked polearm with reach that can trip opponents.

weapons.name: Halberd
weapons.description: An axe-bladed polearm with reach that can deal slashing damage.

weapons.name: Hatchet
weapons.description: A small throwing axe. Agile with sweep for hitting adjacent targets.

weapons.name: Lance
weapons.description: A mounted weapon with reach. Extra damage when jousting on a mount.

weapons.name: Longsword
weapons.description: A standard one-handed sword that can deal piercing damage.

weapons.name: Main-Gauche
weapons.description: A parrying dagger. Agile, finesse, can disarm and parry attacks.

weapons.name: Maul
weapons.description: A heavy two-handed hammer that can shove targets.

weapons.name: Pick
weapons.description: A piercing pick. Fatal d10 changes the damage die to d10 on a critical hit.

weapons.name: Ranseur
weapons.description: A trident-like polearm with reach that can disarm opponents.

weapons.name: Rapier
weapons.description: A finesse thrusting sword. Deadly d8 on critical hits; can disarm.

weapons.name: Sap
weapons.description: A leather-wrapped bludgeon. Agile, nonlethal by default.

weapons.name: Scimitar
weapons.description: A curved blade with forceful and sweep for cleaving through groups.

weapons.name: Scythe
weapons.description: A two-handed blade on a long handle. Deadly d10 on critical hits; can trip.

weapons.name: Shield Bash
weapons.description: A bludgeoning attack using a raised shield.

weapons.name: Shield Boss
weapons.description: A pointed protrusion attached to a shield for improved bashing damage.

weapons.name: Shortsword
weapons.description: A light finesse blade. Agile for rapid strikes; can deal slashing damage.

weapons.name: Starknife
weapons.description: A four-pointed throwing blade. Agile, finesse, deadly, throwable.

weapons.name: Trident
weapons.description: A three-pronged spear throwable up to 20 feet.

weapons.name: War Flail
weapons.description: A two-handed flail that can disarm, sweep, and trip.

weapons.name: Warhammer
weapons.description: A one-handed hammer that can shove targets.

weapons.name: Whip
weapons.description: A finesse weapon with reach. Can disarm and trip; nonlethal by default.

weapons.name: Composite Longbow
weapons.description: A composite bow adding Strength to damage. Volley: -2 penalty within 30 ft.

weapons.name: Composite Shortbow
weapons.description: A compact composite bow adding Strength to damage with 60-foot range.

weapons.name: Longbow
weapons.description: A powerful bow with 100-foot range. Volley: -2 penalty within 30 ft.

weapons.name: Shortbow
weapons.description: A compact bow with 60-foot range increments.

armor.name: Explorer's Clothing
armor.description: Rugged travel clothing providing comfort but no armor bonus.

armor.name: Padded Armor
armor.description: Quilted padding providing comfort and +1 AC with a +3 Dex cap.

armor.name: Leather
armor.description: Hardened leather providing +1 AC with a +4 Dex cap.

armor.name: Studded Leather
armor.description: Leather reinforced with metal studs providing +2 AC.

armor.name: Chain Shirt
armor.description: Interlocking metal rings. Flexible but noisy. +2 AC with +3 Dex cap.

armor.name: Hide
armor.description: Thick animal hides providing +3 AC with a +2 Dex cap.

armor.name: Scale Mail
armor.description: Overlapping metal scales providing +3 AC with a +2 Dex cap.

armor.name: Chain Mail
armor.description: Full chain armor. Flexible but noisy, +4 AC with +1 Dex cap.

armor.name: Breastplate
armor.description: A metal chest piece providing +4 AC with +1 Dex cap.

armor.name: Splint Mail
armor.description: Metal strips riveted to backing. Heavy armor with +5 AC.

armor.name: Half Plate
armor.description: Plate covering half the body. Heavy armor with +5 AC.

armor.name: Full Plate
armor.description: Complete plate armor. +6 AC with Dex cap +0. Bulwark grants +3 to Reflex saves.

shields.name: Buckler
shields.description: A small shield strapped to the forearm. +1 AC when raised. Low HP.

shields.name: Wooden Shield
shields.description: A standard wooden shield. +2 AC when raised. Hardness 3, 12 HP.

shields.name: Steel Shield
shields.description: A reinforced metal shield. +2 AC when raised. Hardness 5, 20 HP.

shields.name: Tower Shield
shields.description: A massive shield providing cover when raised. -5 ft Speed penalty.

gear.name: Acid Flask
gear.description: This ceramic flask contains a dose of acid. You can throw it as a ranged Strike with a range increment of 20 feet. On a hit, the target takes 1 persistent acid damage and 1d6 acid splash damage. On a critical hit, the target also takes 2 persistent acid damage.

gear.name: Adventurer's Pack
gear.description: This includes a backpack, a bedroll, 10 pieces of chalk, flint and steel, 50 feet of rope, 2 weeks' rations, soap, 5 torches, and a waterskin.

gear.name: Alchemist's Fire
gear.description: This liquid ignites when exposed to air. You can throw it as a ranged Strike with a range increment of 20 feet. On a hit, the target takes 1 persistent fire damage and 1 fire splash damage. On a critical hit, the target also takes 2 persistent fire damage.

gear.name: Antidote (Minor)
gear.description: An antidote protects you against toxins. After drinking an antidote, you gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours.

gear.name: Antiplague (Minor)
gear.description: An antiplague protects you against diseases. After drinking an antiplague, you gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours.

gear.name: Backpack
gear.description: A worn container that holds up to 4 Bulk of items. You can carry it in both hands to add its contents to your held items instead of your worn items.

gear.name: Bandolier
gear.description: A bandolier holds up to 8 items of light Bulk within easy reach and is usually strapped across the chest.

gear.name: Bedroll
gear.description: A simple rolled blanket and cushion for sleeping. Provides basic comfort when camping outdoors.

gear.name: Belt Pouch
gear.description: A small waterproof pouch that can hold up to 4 items of negligible Bulk.

gear.name: Caltrops
gear.description: These small metal spikes can be scattered on the ground to injure unwary creatures. You can scatter caltrops in an empty square adjacent to you with an Interact action. The first creature that moves through the square must attempt a DC 14 Acrobatics check or take 1d4 piercing damage and a -5-foot penalty to Speed.

gear.name: Candle
gear.description: A candle sheds dim light in a 10-foot radius for 8 hours.

gear.name: Chain (10 ft)
gear.description: A 10-foot length of chain. It has Hardness 9, HP 36, and BT 18. Chains are sometimes used to bind creatures; escaping requires a DC 26 Athletics check to Force Open.

gear.name: Chalk (10)
gear.description: Chalk can be used to write or mark on most surfaces.

gear.name: Climbing Kit
gear.description: This includes pitons, a hammer, and lengths of cord. When using the kit, you can attach yourself to the surface you're Climbing. If you fall, the piton and cord arrest your fall after 25 feet.

gear.name: Compass
gear.description: A compass helps you determine direction. You gain a +1 item bonus to Survival checks to Sense Direction.

gear.name: Crowbar
gear.description: A crowbar grants a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Force Open an object.

gear.name: Elixir of Life (Minor)
gear.description: Drinking this elixir restores 1d6 Hit Points and grants a +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

gear.name: Flint and Steel
gear.description: Flint and steel can be used to start a fire. Using flint and steel to create a flame requires an Interact action, which is usually enough to ignite a torch or other obvious fuel source.

gear.name: Formula Book
gear.description: A formula book holds the formulas necessary for an alchemist to create items. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 items.

gear.name: Grappling Hook
gear.description: A grappling hook is tied to a rope and can be thrown to hook onto an object. Climbing a rope with a grappling hook attached requires a DC 5 Athletics check.

gear.name: Healer's Tools
gear.description: This kit of bandages, herbs, and suturing tools is necessary for Medicine checks to Administer First Aid, Treat Disease, Treat Poison, or Treat Wounds.

gear.name: Holly and Mistletoe
gear.description: Holly and mistletoe serves as a primal focus for druid spellcasting.

gear.name: Holy Text
gear.description: A holy text is a sacred tome or set of scriptures central to a particular faith. This is required by clerics and champions as part of their devotion.

gear.name: Holy Water
gear.description: This vial of blessed water can be thrown as a ranged Strike with a range increment of 20 feet. It's a simple weapon dealing 1d6 good damage. It deals double damage to undead and fiends.

gear.name: Hourglass
gear.description: An hourglass measures the passage of time, typically calibrated to one hour. Useful for timing watches, rituals, or durations.

gear.name: Ladder (10-foot)
gear.description: A portable 10-foot wooden ladder. Climbing a ladder doesn't require an Athletics check.

gear.name: Lantern (Bull's-Eye)
gear.description: A bull's-eye lantern emits bright light in a 60-foot cone and dim light in the next 60 feet. It burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oil.

gear.name: Lantern (Hooded)
gear.description: A hooded lantern sheds bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light in the next 30 feet. It burns for 6 hours on 1 pint of oil. You can close the hood to reduce the light to dim in a 5-foot radius.

gear.name: Lock (Simple)
gear.description: A simple lock requires a DC 15 Thievery check to pick.

gear.name: Manacles
gear.description: You can manacle a willing or unconscious creature with an Interact action. Escaping requires a DC 17 Thievery check (simple) or DC 22 Athletics check to Force Open.

gear.name: Mirror
gear.description: A small polished metal mirror useful for seeing around corners or signaling allies.

gear.name: Oil (1 pint)
gear.description: Oil can be used to fuel lanterns. A pint of oil burns for 6 hours in a lantern. You can also throw oil as an improvised ranged weapon.

gear.name: Piton
gear.description: A metal spike that can be hammered into a surface to provide a foothold or anchor a rope.

gear.name: Rations (1 week)
gear.description: A week's supply of dried food and water sufficient to sustain one Medium creature.

gear.name: Religious Symbol (Silver)
gear.description: A silver religious symbol of a deity or pantheon. It serves as a divine focus component for divine spells.

gear.name: Religious Symbol (Wooden)
gear.description: A religious symbol is a small token of a deity or pantheon. It can serve as a divine focus component for divine spells.

gear.name: Repair Kit
gear.description: A repair kit allows you to perform simple repairs while traveling. It contains the tools needed to attempt Crafting checks to Repair items.

gear.name: Rope (50 ft)
gear.description: 50 feet of hemp rope with a Climb DC of 15. Can support up to 3,000 pounds before breaking.

gear.name: Sack
gear.description: A sack can hold up to 8 Bulk of items.

gear.name: Signal Whistle
gear.description: A shrill whistle that can be heard clearly up to a quarter mile away.

gear.name: Smokestick
gear.description: When activated by twisting, this short wooden stick creates a 5-foot-radius cloud of smoke for 1 minute. Creatures within the smoke are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them.

gear.name: Soap
gear.description: A bar of soap for cleaning. Essential for basic hygiene on the road.

gear.name: Spellbook
gear.description: A spellbook holds the written magical formulas for arcane spells. Each spellbook can hold up to 100 spells. A wizard typically starts with a spellbook containing 10 cantrips and 8 1st-level spells.

gear.name: Spyglass
gear.description: A small telescope that aids in seeing distant objects. Objects viewed through a spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

gear.name: Sunrod
gear.description: When activated by striking one end on a hard surface, this alchemical rod glows for 6 hours, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in the next 20 feet.

gear.name: Tent (Four-Person)
gear.description: A standard four-person tent. Provides shelter from the elements for up to four Medium creatures.

gear.name: Tent (Pup)
gear.description: A small one-person tent that provides basic shelter from the elements.

gear.name: Thieves' Tools
gear.description: You need thieves' tools to Pick Locks or Disable Devices (of certain types) using the Thievery skill. Without the tools, you can still attempt the check but take a -2 item penalty.

gear.name: Thunderstone
gear.description: When activated and thrown as a ranged Strike with a range increment of 20 feet, this stone shatters with a deafening bang. The target and all creatures within 10 feet must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save or be deafened for 1 round.

gear.name: Tindertwig
gear.description: An alchemically treated wooden stick that ignites when struck against a rough surface. It creates a flame that can be used to light a fire or a torch without a Survival check. Burns for 1 minute.

gear.name: Torch
gear.description: A torch sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in the next 20 feet for 1 hour. It can also be used as an improvised weapon dealing 1 fire damage.

gear.name: Waterskin
gear.description: When full, a waterskin has enough water to provide 1 day of hydration for a Medium creature.

gear.name: Writing Set
gear.description: Using a writing set, you can draft correspondence and scribe scrolls. A writing set includes stationery, ink, a quill or pen, sealing wax, and a simple seal.
